content: What candy brand features colorful button-shaped chocolates with an 'm' printed on each piece?

Ah, that sounds like M&M's! They are those colorful candy-coated chocolates that have the famous "m" logo on them. They come in different colors and flavors, and they're pretty popular all around the world. So, if you're thinking of those little button-shaped chocolates with the 'm' on them, it's probably M&M's.
